DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to examine the effect of zoledronic acid and alendronate on bone metabolism as measured by biomarkers in postmenopausal women with osteoporosis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety/Efficacy of Zoledronic Acid and Alendronate on Bone Metabolism in Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Low bone mineral density (as indicated by a "tscore" of 2.0 or lower) postmenopausal women Previous use of oral and iv bisphosphonates, parathormone, strontium ranelate, sodium fluoride. Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria applied to the study.
